%page 776 Liber

\beginhymn Alleluia.

This alleluia comes from Lauds of Easter Sunday.

\smallskip

\setgregorian1
\musicindent14mm
\setclef14
\raisesong3\Internote
\initiumgregorianum
\musicinitial{Ant.\\VI.}{A}%
\sgn {}Ll\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}el\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}{\'u}-\punctum a\egn
\sgn ia,\punctum M\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\Asteriscus
\divisiominima
\spatium
\sgn {}al\pes Na\egn
\sgn lel\punctum N\egn
\sgn {}u-\punctum M\egn
\sgn ia,\episem L1\clivis KJ\egn
\spatium
\divisiominima
\spatium
\sgn {}al\punctum M\egn
\sgn le-\pes Na\egn
\sgn l{\'u}-\cephalicus NM\egn
\sgn ia.\punctum M\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\Finisgregoriana
